title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29 (Inland Fisheries Ireland) 
(Designation) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29 (inland fishery ireland) (designation) order 2021

title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: Inland Fisheries Ireland is designated for the purposes of section 29 of
text_raw:
2. 

Inland Fisheries Ireland is designated for the purposes of section 29 of 
the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 
of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 April 2021. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [238] 3

title: of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the designation of Inland Fisheries Ireland (IFI) as a 
designated State body pursuant to subsection (3)(a) of section 29 of the Civil 
Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [238]
